entry.title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Memory in Python But Were Afraid to Ask
entry.summary:
Description

Tytuł/Topic: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Memory in Python But Were Afraid to Ask Prelegent/Speaker: Piotr Przymus

Have you ever wondered what happens to all the precious RAM after running your 'simple' CPython code? Prepare yourself for a short introduction to CPython memory management! This presentation will try to answer some memory related questions you always wondered about. It will also discuss basic memory profiling tools and techniques.

http://pl.pycon.org/2014/pl/agenda

entry.title: Krótkie wprowadzenie do metaprogramowania w Pythonie - czyli o tym jak ułatwić (utrudnić) programowanie sobie i innym.
entry.summary:
Description

Tytuł/Topic: Krótkie wprowadzenie do metaprogramowania w Pythonie - czyli o tym jak ułatwić (utrudnić) programowanie sobie i innym. Prelegent/Speaker: Piotr Przymus

Metaprogramowanie - to dynamiczne tworzenie kodu lub modyfikowanie działania uruchomionego programu. Python daje nam w tym temacie szerokie możliwości. Krótki tutorial dla tych którzy chcą lepiej poznać takie techniki metaprogramowania jak dekoratory, metaklasy, syntetycznie generowany kod czy 'monkey patching'.

http://pl.pycon.org/2013/pl/agenda

entry.title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Memory in Python But Were Afraid to Ask
entry.summary:
Summary

Have you ever wondered what happens to all the precious RAM after running your 'simple' CPython code? Prepare yourself for a short introduction to CPython memory management! This presentation will try to answer some memory related questions you always wondered about. It will also discuss basic memory profiling tools and techniques.

Description

This talk will cover basics of CPython memory usage. It will start with basics like objects and data structures representation. Then advanced memory management aspects, such as sharing, segmentation, preallocation or caching, will be discussed. Finally, memory profiling tools will be presented.
